{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AVM |model=FRITZ!Box 7360 |revision=v1 (HW196) |series=N300 |ean=4023125027833 |asin=B008BYZ2AK |is_manuf=No |availability=now |est_release_date=02/2012 |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB80920;PSB80920 V1.2, XWAY VRX288; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29GL128FHT2I-90G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W971GG6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8030-A |eth_chip3_brand=Atheros |eth_chip3_model=AR8030-A |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=xDSL AFE;Lantiq;PSB 80190;PSB 80190 V, V1.1, XWAY VRX208;1; ,,, POTS/PSTN (DAA) Chip;Silicon Labs;IA3222B;;1; ,,, POTS/PSTN (DAA) Chip;Silicon Labs;IA3223A;;1; ,,, DECT Chip;Dialog;SC14441B;;1; |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL, DECT, VoIP, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=FRITZ!Box 7360 |default_ssid_regex=^FRITZ!Box 7360$ |default_ip=192.168.178.1 }} {{TagLine|AVM FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 Router}} :[https://avm.de/service/fritzbox/fritzbox-7360-sl/uebersicht/ Support page] {{•}} [https://en.avm.de/fileadmin/user_upload/EN/Manuals/FRITZ_Box/Manual_FRITZBox_7360.pdf Manual (en)]
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/avm/fritz.box.wlan.7360 ''FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *{{fritzbox|7360}} *{{boxmatrix|7360,7360v1,7360v2,7360sl}} :mips34_16MB_vdsl_dect441_2eth_2geth_1ab_2usb_host_wlan11n_30806
===Externals=== * 1× Combined FXO (POTS/PSTN, pins 3 and 6) and DSL (pins 4 and 5) :port with 8P8C connector * 1× FXS port (''FON 1'') with 6P4C connector and a discrete component :(apparently) driver (cf. IA3222 and IA3223 for POTS/PSTN port) * 4× Ethernet ports: ** 2× Fast Ethernet (10/100 Mbit/s) ports ** 2× Gigabit Ethernet (10/100/1000 Mbit/s) ports
===Internals=== Two-part plastic clamshell, with 4× T9 screws, 2 to the rear, 2 under the forward :LRF, and one clip center-front. No further tooled disassembly required. There are 2× U.FL connectors on the cicuit board for the WiFi (not for DECT) antennae.
The device generates at least the following voltages internally: * From the [[Texas Instruments]] TPS65252 buck converter: ** +3.3 V ** +1.05 V * From a buck converter: +1.85 V * From a buck converter: +5 V * From a boost converter: +18.75 V
===See also=== :[https://boxmatrix.info/wiki/FRITZ!Box_Fon_WLAN_7360_Versions ''FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 Versions'' on '''BoxMatrix''' Wiki] *[[AVM FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 SL]] (HW181) - N300 WLAN Modem Router *[[AVM FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 EWE]] (HW183) - N300 WLAN Modem Router *[[AVM FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 v1]] (HW183) - N300 WLAN Modem Router *[[AVM FRITZ!Box Fon WLAN 7360 v2]] (HW196) - N300 WLAN Modem Router
